    View for the login to the application.
    Author:
    Dennis Stumm

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render()
        Renders the login view on the console.

      • showLogin

        private void showLogin()
        Reads the login data from console input and tries to login into the application with the inputted data. If the login was incorrect the user gets informed and the user will be forced again to login by calling this method recursively. Otherwise the next view gets displayed by calling the transition method of the controller.
